function.name: device_decrease
function.description: This function is used to decrease a setting on a specified SmartThings device without turning it off.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to decrease.

groupAction.description: The group action to perform on the device.

integer.description: The level delta to decrease the device setting.

predefinedUnit.description: The predefined unit related to the device setting.
